fixes.name: Discount Amount
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau calculated field [Discount Amount] = [Sales]*[Discount] to a row-level DAX calculated column using the same-table column references. This is a calculated column because it performs a per-row arithmetic operation without aggregation.

fixes.name: Discount Health
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression [Discount Amount]/[Sales] to a DAX calculated column. All column references were mapped to 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Column]. This is a calculated column because it performs row-level division using existing row-level fields without aggregation.
